thread.title: Disney Doodle: Simba & Mufasa Have Father-Son Time at Disney’s Animal Kingdom Lodge
thread.title_full: Disney Doodle: Simba & Mufasa Have Father-Son Time at Disney’s Animal Kingdom Lodge

author: Jennifer Fickley-Baker
title: Disney Doodle: Simba & Mufasa Have Father-Son Time at Disney’s Animal Kingdom Lodge
text:
Today’s Disney Doodle focuses on a favorite father-son pair, Simba and Mufasa from “ The Lion King .”
In this graphic, artist Ashley Taylor imagines what the duo would do if they had the chance to visit the Walt Disney World Resort . According to her, she can easily imagine them checking out life on the savanna over at Disney’s Animal Kingdom Lodge .
“I’ve stayed at Disney’s Animal Kingdom Lodge before and it’s absolutely breathtaking. I can easily image Simba and Mufasa spending their mornings there!”
